column3: Welcome to TIC groceries! What can I help you with today?
Hi Gregory! I'm looking for some fruit and veggies. Can I get some suggestions?
Absolutely! We have a wide selection of fruits and vegetables available. What's your favorite type of produce?
I love pineapples and carrots. Do you have any pineapples in stock?
We've got 5-6 bunches of fresh pineapple chunks available. Each bunch is about 1 pound.
Sounds good! I'll take a few bunches then. Can I get 2 or 3?
That's $2.50 per bunch. So that would be...
Wait, how many pineapples are in each bunch again?
Each bunch has about 12-13 pineapple chunks.
Got it! I'll take 3 bunches then.
Alrighty then! That's $7.50 for the pineapples. Now let me check on our vegetable selection...
And what about carrots? Do you have any of those?
We've got a variety pack of 500g carrot sticks available for €1.00 per half-kilogram.
That sounds good! How many grams are in each stick?
Each stick is approximately 50-60g.
Okay no problem! I'll take a few packs then.
Alrighty then! That's €2.00 per half-kilogram. So that would be...
Wait, how many sticks are in each pack?
Each pack has about 10-12 carrot sticks.
Got it! I'll take one or two packs then.
Alrighty then! That's €2.00 per half-kilogram. So that would be...
I think I've got everything now. Can you ring me up?
Of course thing! Your grand total comes out to $9.50 for the pineapples and carrots.
